sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The component KFTX is an extension of KFT making possible the communication between it and BAP. This component is developed as integration code by project team and covers functionality that is not provided by the 3rd party CARIAD for the KFT library.

Note: Components are those components that KFTX interacts with, for more details, see VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ApplicationLayer.ZV_Lib.SW Architecture.KFTX.KFTX Static.KFTX Context
